captions.text: - Are you afraid to move?
- Yeah.
(techno music)

Personal development system.
- Mhmm
- What am I gonna develop into?
Now we put these? Full immersion.
- Mhmm.

- Like this guy's about
to hack into the Matrix.
- Is this supposed to help me relax?
- I feel like I'm dreaming.

- You don't have a history
of epilepsy, do you?
- I want to move in slow motion.

- It hit this note that made
me feel like I was gonna poop.
- I feel like I'm in the fourth dimension.
- We are the fourth dimension.
- Am I yelling?
- Whoa, close your eyes.
- Oh my God, close your eyes. Wow.

- Oh! Oh that feels
better, with eyes closed!
- Whoa! Whoa!
- Oh my God!

- Oh my gosh, I'm seeing
colors I've never seen before.
- I'm sweating.
- Oh, turn it up louder.
- I need more volume. Oh, if you turn the,

whoa, turn the volume
up as loud as it goes.
- Where is it? Is this, what is it?
Wait, where, what are you pushing?

- I feel like the sounds
have more potential
to relax me than the whatever is happening
in front of my face, right now.

- I feel like I'm a robot
that's powering down.
Like, very, very slowly.

- I don't know where you are,
but now I'm at a dance party.

- The lights and sounds
just make you think

of all the terrible things
you've ever done in your life.
- What?
- What?
- What?

- Yeah.
- Yeah.
- Is this how we come down from this?
I feel like it's like scuba diving,

like we're gonna get the bends
if we take it off too fast.

- No, I'm not taking it off,
I'm never taking it off.

- I don't wanna
- This is mine, now!
- Oh, what?
- This kind of makes me want to do drugs.

- That's terrible.
- I'm not gonna lie, like--
- These are gateway glasses.
- This is great.

- Mine's spots 'cause all I
can see right now are spots.

- This is an important
piece of human invention.
(beat boxing)
- [Voiceover] It's so wild!
- So when do people wear this?
When they go to sleep?
When they make love?
- Oh yeah, I would do that!
